title: Police officer on warrior mindset: We’re fighting this as a war, yet we live here
description: Officer Skinner on the warrior mindset of police: “We’re fighting this as a war on crime. And yet here we have homefield advantage. We live here, and they’re our neighbors. This is not enemies. And I’m just tired of being afraid of my neighbors.”
